mapper.select: select count(*) from product_inquiry where product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: insert into product_inquiry (productInquiry_id, customer_id, product_id, product_inquiry_content, product_inquiry_date, product_inquiry_answered) values(#{productInquiryId}, #{customerId}, #{productId}, #{productInquiryContent}, #{productInquiryDate}, #{productInquiryAnswered})
mapper.update: update product_inquiry set product_inquiry_answered = 'TRUE' where product_inquiry_id=#{productInquiryId}
